pr_title: Hide Default* implementations behind interface factory methods.

timeline.message: Hide Default* implementations behind interface factory methods.

timeline.bodyText: The name of the method is misleading, for metrics it is right now a noop but we may add small functionality. Not sure about a better name but wanted to raise this issue
timeline.author: bogdandrutu

replies.bodyText: Hmm - how about just getDefault then? An unfortunately generic name but it does give us flexibility to change so it seems like a better name.
replies.author: anuraaga

replies.bodyText: yeah, I think getDefault might be better, even though I much prefer saying "NOOP" loudly whenever I read the code. ;)
replies.author: jkwatson

timeline.bodyText: why lowercase? Isn't the DefaultMeter immutable?
timeline.author: jkwatson

replies.bodyText: It seemed slightly more cool than a boring constant but that's true :)
replies.author: anuraaga

timeline.bodyText: I wonder how much value these tests are really providing.
timeline.author: jkwatson

replies.bodyText: I think they make sure we don't actually add a dependency on the SDK from the API and don't know if any of our other tests do. So that's probably good value.
replies.author: anuraaga
